Key Match Events: Santi Aldama allowed Jaylen Wells to score 14 first-half points
Ja Morant made insane passes and acrobatic layups
Jay Huff scored 20 points and pulled down five rebounds in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: The Sixers were without Paul George and Joel Embiid due to injuries
Tyrese Maxey was struggling with inefficient offense
Memphis was coming off a blowout win against the Milwaukee Bucks
Ja Morant and Jaren Jackson Jr. were expected to dominate the game
Post-Match Reflections: Head coach Nick Nurse commented on difficulties with rebounding and defending the low post
Tyrese Maxey needs someone else to step up to take the pressure off
Missing a true 'power forward' is an obvious hole for the Sixers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Desmond Bane and Marcus Smart were out for the Grizzlies
Jared McCain was the only bright spot for the Sixers in the second half
Non-household names like Jaylen Wells and Jay Huff performed well against the Sixers
